Synopsis: Retrieves OpenAI assistants based on specified criteria.
Description: The Get-OAIAssistant function retrieves OpenAI assistants based on the specified criteria such as name, limit, order, after, before, and raw output.
Outputs: The function returns a collection of OpenAI assistants based on the specified criteria.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIAssistant -Name "MyAssistant" -Limit 10 -Order 'asc'
Retrieves the first 10 OpenAI assistants with the name "MyAssistant" in ascending order.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIAssistant -Limit 5 -After "cursor123"
Retrieves the next 5 OpenAI assistants created after the cursor "cursor123".
